mapper.select: SELECT talks_id, talks_title, talks_regdate, member_mem_id, views FROM talks ORDER BY to_number(talks_id) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO talks_image (uuid, talks_loc, filename, talks_talks_id) VALUES(#{uuid}, #{talks_loc}, #{filename}, #{talks_talks_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE talks SET views = views + 1 WHERE talks_id = #{talks_id}
